name: Rentalo
tag_list: vacation-rental, hotels, bed-and-breakfasts, vacation-lodging, accommodations, vacation-rental-by-owner
overview:
Rentalo is a worldwide travel accommodation online directory and search engine. Rentalo helps travelers to easily and quickly find and inquire on the most suitable vacation rentals by owner, hotels, bed and breakfasts and other types of vacation lodgings and accommodations. Rentalo is also a provider of Advertising and Inquiry/Booking Tools and Marketing Services to Property Owners, Hotel Managers and Inn Keepers who want to gain exposure and secure more business on the Internet.

Rentalo.com is a subsidiary of privately held HQ Telecom, headquartered in Miami, Florida.
